section.name: New Releases
section.p: February 9, 2012. OpenIDM 2.0.2 has been released as the latest supported version on the 2.0.x branch. Get it now from the download page. See the release notes for more information.
January 15, 2012. OpenIDM 2.0.1 is out. You can download it at ForgeRock.org/openidm.html. See the release notes for details.
December 24, 2011. OpenIDM 2.0.0 is now available. Get it from the download page. See the list of fixes in the release notes.

May 31, 2011. The OpenIDM team has announced OpenIDM 2.0 Milestone 1, the revolutionary step towards the next generation, lightweight, scalable, highly modular and developer friendly Identity Management solution. OpenIDM 2.0 Milestone 1 includes full capability to perform synchronization, reconciliation and basic account administration as well as exposing a RESTful web API to the core services of OpenIDM. Visit the download page to get started.
